verse: One time Jesus was praying in a certain place. When he finished, one of his followers said to him, “Lord, teach us to pray as John taught his followers.”
Jesus said to them, “When you pray, say:
Then Jesus said to them, “Suppose one of you went to your friend’s house at midnight and said to him, ‘Friend, loan me three loaves of bread.
One time Jesus was sending out a demon who could not talk. When the demon came out, the man who had been unable to speak, then spoke. The people were amazed.
But some of them said, “Jesus uses the power of Beelzebul, the ruler of demons, to force demons out of people.”
Other people, wanting to test Jesus, asked him to give them a sign from heaven.
But knowing their thoughts, he said to them, “Every kingdom that is divided against itself will be destroyed. And a family that is divided against itself will not continue.
As Jesus was saying these things, a woman in the crowd called out to Jesus, “Blessed is the mother who gave birth to you and nursed you.”
But Jesus said, “No, blessed are those who hear the teaching of God and obey it.”
As the crowd grew larger, Jesus said, “The people who live today are evil. They want to see a miracle for a sign, but no sign will be given them, except the sign of Jonah.

header: Be a Light for the World

verse: After Jesus had finished speaking, a Pharisee asked Jesus to eat with him. So Jesus went in and sat at the table.
But the Pharisee was surprised when he saw that Jesus did not wash his hands before the meal.
The Lord said to him, “You Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and the dish, but inside you are full of greed and evil.

header: Jesus Talks to Experts on the Law

verse: One of the experts on the law said to Jesus, “Teacher, when you say these things, you are insulting us, too.”
Jesus answered, “How terrible for you, you experts on the law! You make strict rules that are very hard for people to obey, but you yourselves don’t even try to follow those rules.
When Jesus left, the teachers of the law and the Pharisees began to give him trouble, asking him questions about many things,
trying to catch him saying something wrong.
